actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate the limitation of "years of service" credit for military service to wartime service.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to include all military service (presently only wartime military service) as years of service in computing the amount of an annuity for a retired railroad employee.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to eliminate the limitation of "years of service" credit for military service to wartime service.
